name: しぐれうい †時雨憂† 时雨羽衣 Shigure Ui
description:
这个lora可以画你的老婆, 参考例图.

里面有两种主要的发饰发型.

There are two hair styles in this lora. Trigger words are pom_pom_short_twintails and pom_pom_hair_rings.

Example prompts / 触发词示例

<lora:shigure_ui:0.7>, shigure ui \(vtuber\), pom_pom_short_twintails

or

<lora:shigure_ui:0.7>, shigure ui \(vtuber\), pom_pom_hair_rings, short_hair,

or simply just

<lora:shigure_ui:0.8>, pom_pom,

you don't have to describe her eye color or hair color unless you want something different. You can use red_beret, beret, pom_pom_necktie, striped_school_uniform, black_school_shoes to describe her 'official' costume.

Adding words like standing, sitting, upper_body, full_body to control positions.

meta.prompt:

<lora:shigure_ui:0.8>, shigure ui \(vtuber\),  pom_pom_short_twintails, upper body, smile,
